pages.text: 28|36|Pas, cun Muso ʙo mu'cizoti ravsani Mo ʙa sujason omad, guftand: «In [cize] nest, magar codue soxta va mo hargiz in [iddaoi jaktoparasti]-ro az padaronamon nasnidaem»
28|37|Va Muso guft: «Parvardigoram ʙehtar medonad, ci kase hidojatro az nazdi U ovardaast va [ogohtar ast, ki] oqiʙati neki on saro ʙaroi kist. Be tardid, sitamgoron rostkor namesavand»

28|38|Fir'avn guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, ma'ʙude ʙa cuz xud ʙarojaton namesinosam, pas, ej Homon, ʙarojam otase ʙar gil ʙarafruz [va xist ʙipaz], on goh ʙurci ʙalande ʙisoz, ʙosad, ki az ma'ʙudi Muso ʙoxaʙar savam. Har cand ki hatman, uro duruƣgu mepindoram»
28|39|Va u [Fir'avn] va laskarijonas ʙa nohaq dar sarzamin [-i Misr] sarkasi kardand va pindostand, ki ʙa suji Mo ʙozgardonda namesavand
28|40|Pas, [mo] u va laskarijonasro [ʙa azoʙ] furu giriftem va ononro ʙa darjo andoxtem. Pas, ʙingar, ki oqiʙati sitamgoron ci guna ʙud
28|41|Va ononro pesvojone qaror dodem, ki [pajravonasonro] ʙa otasi [duzax] da'vat mekardand va ruzi qijomat jori namesavand
28|42|Dar in dunjo ʙa dunʙolason la'nat ravon kardem va ruzi qijomat [niz] zistmanzarand
28|43|Va ʙa rosti, pas az on ki ummathoi pesinro noʙud namudem, ʙa Muso kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem, ki [mustamil ʙar] ravsangariho va hidojat va rahmate ʙaroi mardum ʙud, ʙosad, ki pand pazirand
